name: Mwana Kupona binti Msbam
suggestion: FROM A MOTHER' S ADVICE AND PRAYER: AN EPIC POEM
Source: Amandina Lihamba , Fulata L . Moyo , M.M . Mulokozi, Naomi L. Shitemi, Saida Yahya-Othman(2007). Women writing africa: the eastern region. Feminist Press at the City University of New York.

name: Bibi Pirira Athumani
suggestion: THE STEPMOTHER, LOVE HAS NO CURE
Source: Amandina Lihamba , Fulata L . Moyo , M.M . Mulokozi, Naomi L. Shitemi, Saida Yahya-Othman(2007). Women writing africa: the eastern region. Feminist Press at the City University of New York.

name: Mary Penelope Mfune
birth_place: Chief Mukutuma's village, Ndola Rural District
Source: M. J. Daymond, Dorothy Driver, Sheila Meintjes, Leloba Molema, Chiedza Musengezi, Margie Orford, Nobantu Rasebotsa (2003). Women writing africa: The Southern Region. The Feminist Press at the City University of New York.
